panels.description: Counters of the TP generated by the most active channels

targets.query: SELECT "element" AS "DLH", "channel", "number_of_tps" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.TPChannelInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter

panels.title: TP channel counters

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("number_of_tps")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.TPChannelInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~/${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "channel" fill(null)

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate_tp_hits")*1000 FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.HitFindingInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

panels.title: Handlers - TP hit rates

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.HitFindingInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

panels.title: Handlers - TP Sent rates

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("tp_received")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TPStreamWriterInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("tp_written")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TPStreamWriterInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("tpset_received")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TPStreamWriterInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.HitFindingInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_too_long")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.HitFindingInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Handlers - Total TP dropped rates

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.HitFindingInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_too_long")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.HitFindingInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

panels.title: Producers - TP Suppresed rates: too long

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate_payloads_consumed")*1000 FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE session='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

panels.title: Processors - TP receiving rates

targets.query: SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.LatencyBufferInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

SELECT sum("data") FROM ( SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.LatencyBufferInfo" WHERE  "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null) ) GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "element", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT min("min_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("num_requests_waiting") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND "element" =~ /${tp_handler}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SELECT "element" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "element" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND application=~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter )
list.name: DLH
list.query: SELECT "element" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "element" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND application=~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter )

list.definition: SELECT "element" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "element" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND application=~ /${application}/ AND subelement='TPProcessor' AND $timeFilter )
list.label: TP Handlers
list.name: tp_handler
list.query: SELECT "element" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "element" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.DataHandlerInfo" WHERE "session"='${session}' AND application=~ /${application}/ AND subelement='TPProcessor' AND $timeFilter )
